column2: The notification marker by the Daily Story button while there is no available Daily Story to complete is actually a "Hidden" Story
column3: There will be a floating blue  ( ! ) by the left side of your Central Office in Tempest
column4: Shoutout to reddit user u/Jlbos13 for finding the hidden ( ! )
column5: Note: This story does not count towards the total (-- / 55) completed for magicrystal rewards
